Key Match Events: Lautaro Martínez scored twice for Argentina
Post-Match Reflections: Lautaro Martínez expressed his joy of wearing the Argentina shirt
Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni was suspended for the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of about 64,000 fans at the Miami Dolphins’ Hard Rock Stadium
Most fans cheered for Argentina while wearing different versions of Messi’s No. 10 jersey
Others: Argentina controlled possession (74%) for the third straight match
Emiliano Martínez did not allow a goal in the round and made six saves
